role.argrole: agent doing the inauguration or opening

example.parse: NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN مشروع) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المدرسة) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المهنية)) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON التي)) (S (VP (IV1P+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I ننتظر) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NP (IVSUFF_DO:3FS ها)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-1))) (NP-ADV (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_INDEF_ACC جميعاً)) (PP (PREP على) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN أمل) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN افتتاح) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (POSS_PRON_3FS ها)) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC قريباً)) (NP-MNR (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC مع) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN نواب) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN اللقاء) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الديموقراطي))) (CONJ و) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN وزير) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN التربية))) (NP (PUNC -LRB-) (NOUN_PROP عبد) (DET+NOUN_PROP الرحيم) (NOUN_PROP مراد) (PUNC -RRB-)))))))))
